Na BlizzCone predstavili Diablo IV: Hra bude temná a krvavá, pribudnú aj nové triedy a skilly
02 Nov 2019, 14:34 by Timea Krauszová

Fanúšikovia si však ešte budú musieť počkať. Zatiaľ sa môžu pokochať úžasným trailerom.

Ako sme už avizovali, BlizzCon v Anaheime príjemne prekvapil hneď v prvý deň, keď predstavil úchvatný cinematic trailer k Diablo IV. Urobil tak napriek tomu, že pred rokom fanúšikov varoval, aby v také niečo nedúfali. Poteší ťa informácia o novom engine, hru vyvíjajú pre PC, PS4, Xbox One. Nanešťastie, ešte si na ňu počkáš. Presný dátum vydania zatiaľ známy nie je.
Štvorka nadväzuje na predošlé časti
Diablo IV sa odohráva niekoľko rokov po udalostiach z trojky. Ide o temnejšiu hru, ktorá sa vracia ku koreňom. Naďalej pôjde o krvavú hru plnú kultov, ktorá sa v mnohom inšpirovala predošlými dielmi, z dvojky si napríklad prevzala talentové stromy a runy. Ústredným nepriateľom bude Lilith, o ktorej sme už počuli predtým. Priviedli ju zlodeji a prví nephalem.



V centre diania bude Sanctuary, kde budú hráči bojovať, obchodovať a objavovať príbeh. Bude tu tiež priestor na duely v PvP zónach. Okrem iného predstavil Blizzard aj tri novučičké triedy: Barbar, Čarodejnica a Druid. V čom sa tieto triedy líšia?



Barbar je silná postava so 4 slotmi na zbrane a plošnými útokmi. Druid je zaujímavá postava, využíva prírodnú mágiu a má zvieracích spoločníkov. Sám sa na zviera môže kedykoľvek premeniť, a to aj uprostred zápasu. Čarodejnica je pomerne klasická postava, k dispozícii má množstvo útokov, napríklad fireballmi. Okrem toho môže osvetliť tmavé dungeony.
Na BlizzCone okrem panelovej diskusie očakávame aj nové demo.

At BlizzCone, Diablo IV: Dark and Bloody, New Classes and Skills
02 Nov 2019, 14:34 by Timea Krauszova

But fans still have to wait. Meanwhile, they can enjoy an amazing trailer.

As we have already announced, BlizzCon in Anaheim was pleasantly surprised on the very first day when he presented a breathtaking cinematic trailer for Diablo IV. He did so despite warning the fans one year ago not to hope for something like that. You will be happy to know about the new engine, the game is being developed for PC, PS4, Xbox One. Unfortunately, you'll wait for her. The exact release date is not yet known.
The quad follows the previous sections
Diablo IV takes place several years after the events of the three. This is a darker game that returns to the roots. It will continue to be a bloody game full of cults, which has been inspired in many ways by previous works, for example, it has acquired talent trees and runes from number two. The central enemy will be Lilith, which we have heard about before. It was brought by thieves and the first by nephalem.



At the center of the action will be the Sanctuary, where players will fight, trade and discover the story. There will also be space for duels in the PvP zones. Among other things, Blizzard introduced three new classes: Barbarian, Witch and Druid. How do these classes differ?



Barbarian is a strong character with 4 weapons slots and area attacks. Druid is an interesting character, using natural magic and has animal companions. He can turn into an animal at any time, even in the middle of a match. The witch is a fairly classic character, and has many attacks, such as fireballs. In addition, it can illuminate dark dungeons.
In addition to panel discussion, we expect a new demo at BlizzCone.
